title: Content
description: An object describing the type, availability, and location of tile content.

mimeType.description: The mime type of the content.

uri.description: A template URI pointing to tile content. Content exists wherever the availability bit is 1. The URI of each content is substituted with the tile's global level, x, y, and z (OCTREE only). All content must conform to the `mimeType`.

availability.description: An object describing the availability of content in the tileset. If content availability is 1 its corresponding tile availability must also be 1. If content availability is 0 and its corresponding tile availability is 1 then the tile is considered to be an empty tile.
